Voter registration group sent 500: 000 applications for absentee ballots, not actual ballots, to Virginia voters with the wrong elections office return address.
Around 226: 000 ballots sent to voters in Clark County, Nevada, were returned as undeliverable because the voters no longer lived at the addresses.
Neither Virginia nor Nevada has sent bal: 4. There was no evidence of thousands of ballots being sent to dead people and pets in either Virginia or Nevada.
